resources.string: There was a problem parsing the package.

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by unknown apps. By installing this app, you agree that you are responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from its use.

建议您开启专为长辈设计的“安全守护”，保护安全，解决手机使用问题。

"This app isn't compatible with your system"
Contact the developer or install a compatible version from GetApps.
该应用以破坏系统安全方式安装
卸载或关闭“未知安装来源”权限
您的设备和个人数据更容易受到未知应用的攻击。安装来自该来源的应用即表示，您同意对因使用这些应用可能导致的设备损坏或数据丢失问题承担责任。
由用户投诉并经小米应用商店审核，该应用存在安全风险，已停止其安装应用。请注意，该应用提供的其他应用，也可能存在风险。
"Couldn't check this installation package. This app might not be compatible with the current version of Android."
Try to find a replacement for this app in GetApps
Sign in to your Mi Account to continue with installation. You can also change your installation preferences in Settings > Install risky apps.
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
我们将持续保护您的安全
Uninstall the current version of this app and install the app again.
Installation package might be corrupted. Download the app again.
Try saving the installation package to a different location.
Free up storage in Security > Cleaner and try again.
Try using a compatible installation package.
Delete the already installed version and try to install again.
Download the latest version of this app in GetApps.
Wait a minute or two and try again
"There's a newer version of this app installed in Second space or Kid space."

Use a compatible version of this app
"App data may contain this app's downloads, files, etc."
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
"Couldn't connect to the network to run a security check"
您当前未设置指纹/锁屏密码/人脸密码，请先前往“系统设置”内设置指纹/锁屏密码/人脸密码

"This app hasn't passed Xiaomi security tests and isn't available in GetApps yet. You can allow installing this app if you trust it. Remember that the apps that haven't passed our security tests might pose risks."
Check apps for possible risks and security issues before installation
Secure mode is on. Changes will be applied during the next installation.
For accessing location when the app is running in the background
For positioning via location information for saved media
For accessing, checking, and clearing notifications that include passwords and banking information
For accessing step count and other physical activity-related information
For accessing data generated by body sensors, such as heart rate information
For accessing call status and phone numbers of calls
For taking photos and recording videos
For accessing a list of social media and communication accounts on your device
For accessing information about installed apps
For monitoring recently and currently used apps
For discovering and connecting to nearby devices, including Bluetooth devices
For accessing events and activities on the calendar
For accessing information about incoming and outgoing calls
For reading cell broadcasts received by your device
For recognizing contacts and the frequency of interaction with them
For accessing photos, documents, and other media stored on the device
For accessing phone numbers on the device
For accessing call status and mobile network information
For checking messages for passwords and banking information
For monitoring and deleting incoming MMS messages
For monitoring and deleting incoming SMS messages
For monitoring and delete incoming wireless application protocols
For recording audio, including calls and conversations
For taking photos and recording videos
For adding events and activities to the calendar
For saving photos, documents, and other media
Access location while running in the background
Access approximate location while running in the foreground
Access location information for saved media
Access the list of apps installed on this device
Check apps from unknown sources for possible security risks before installation
Monitor, control, and restrict harmful app activity
Check payment environment for security issues to ensure validity of financial transactions
Control privacy related permissions to prevent your personal information from being exposed
Detect suspicious activity and block possible fraud
Secure mode makes sure that every app installed on your device has passed Xiaomi security tests.
建议您开启专为长辈设计的安全守护
请确认本次安装是您主动选择
安全守护中，为保护您的权益，避免无用应用占用存储空间，及恶意应用带来安全风险，已禁止非官方来源的应用安装。
如仍需安装，您可前往「安全守护设置」中操作。
可前往浏览器继续下载该应用
"I'm willing to take all possible risks."

"This app is developed by a third-party and might violate local laws and regulations. Xiaomi doesn't guarantee the availability, continuity, and accessibility of the content and services provided by this app. Any loss or damage brought about by the use of this app will be borne by you."
"You've authorized installing %1$s. You can continue once the installation package is detected."
已禁止风险来源的安装请求
该应用为风险应用，疑为诈骗高风险软件，可能造成您的财产损失和隐私泄露，请谨慎使用
\"%1$s\"为风险应用，可能会侵犯您的隐私，或带来财产损失。为避免相关威胁，建议您选择禁止下载该应用。
该应用为风险应用，可能会侵犯您的隐私，或带来财产损失。为避免相关威胁，建议您选择禁止下载该应用。

"If you turn this feature off, any apps you're trying to install will no longer be checked for security issues and risky apps will be installed directly without your authorization. We'll have to verify your screen lock or fingerprint if you've set them previously."
为了安全着想，请开启安全守护
如您无需安全守护，可前往关闭
未经小米安全检测的未上架应用、病毒和风险应用，不建议您安装。避免给您的手机造成破坏，或带来财产损失、隐私风险等。
将为您检测第三方来源应用的安全性
"You won't be able to learn whether the apps you install gave passed our security tests after you turn off Safe mode. Turn off anyway?"

"If you turn this feature off, apps that haven't passed Xiaomi security tests will be able to be installed on your device. To avoid security risks, you can allow installing this app once if you trust it. Keeping Secure mode on will help you avoid security risks in the future."
为了安全起见，请开启安全守护，以保护您的设备安全、隐私安全、财产安全等。
People who install <font color=#0BAE73>%1$s</font> also like
待安装的应用未经小米应用商店审核时，授权并验证身份后方可继续安装
关闭后，系统无法对应用进行安全检查，所有应用无需任何授权即可直接安装，您须自行承担因此产生的任何风险。关闭需通过您当前设置的授权方式进行验证。
Thank you for using Secure mode
Why are you turning off Secure mode?
"I can't install apps when it's on"
"It makes no difference whether it's on or off"
Tell us how we can improve our services
保护安全，解决手机使用问题

安全守护将持续保护你的设备

应用自动下载并安装其他应用时，提醒您，并需获得您的同意
安装过程中，识别风险、有害、病毒应用，保护系统安全
检测支付环境安全，识别支付风险，保护财产安全

担心下载的应用不安全？担心隐私被过度获取？担心被广告诱导误安装应用？启用安全守护，你会发现这些问题都迎刃而解了
识别电信诈骗风险，拦截诈骗应用，防护风险转账

默认禁止从非官方渠道安装应用，避免被广告应用、恶意应用等诱导下载广告
默认禁止通过小米浏览器下载风险应用，防止被诱导安装病毒、风险、广告应用

"This app is needed for your profile and can't be uninstalled."
"Can't uninstall because this package is an active device administrator."

Replace this app with the factory version? All data will be removed.
Replace this app with the factory version? All data will be removed. This affects all users of this device, including those with work profiles.
"Your administrator doesn't allow installation of apps obtained from unknown sources."

如果您已知晓可能存在的风险并自愿承担可能导致的后果，可继续授权本次安装

Your device and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by unknown apps. By installing apps from this source, you agree that you are responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from their use.

If you trust this app, tap the Settings icon and select \"Secure mode\" to authorize its installation.
Sign in to your Xiaomi Account to be able to continue installation.
